text: @senatemajldr Try taking out the corporate lunch tax break and the bill blocking people from suing over COVID19.  Add in food assistance for hungry Americans and then you might have a deal.  Republicans never tell the whole story.  Thank God #MoscowMitch will be gone soon.  Vote Blue!
